resources.string: Since you\'ve denied access to your location, you could not be located on the map.
Since you\'ve denied access to your precise location, you can grant your permission only in the app\'s settings.
In order to position the map to your location, the app must have your permission to access location services.\nDo you agree to share your location with the app ?
Unfortunately the GPS connectivity was lost.
Since the GPS was not turned in, you could not be located on the map.
Unfortunately the GPS could not be managed at the moment.\nPlease try enabling you GPS by yourself.
